about_the_game:
Enter a cursed forest filled with ancient magic, sinister foes, and untold danger in Burn The Witch: Toll of the Bell Bearer. This roguelike deck-builder challenges you to forge powerful cards, adapt your strategy on the fly, and survive against your enemies.

Forge Your Power: Discover or craft powerful cards with unique abilities as you explore the cursed lands. Build a deck that reflects your strategy, finding synergies and unleashing devastating combos to vanquish your foes.

Adapt or Fall: As your enemies grow stronger and deadlier, so must your deck. Reforge and customize your card collection mid-run to survive the escalating challenges. Every decision counts, as one misstep could be your last.

Seek Ancient Shrines: Gain favor from ancient shrines scattered throughout the forest, each offering unique buffs and enhancements. The blessings you receive change with every run, offering new ways to play and adjust your strategy.

Learn from Defeat: Every death is an opportunity to learn and grow. Harness the power of the wicked ashes from fallen enemies to fuel your future runs, making each attempt a little easier and wiser than the last.

Dynamic Challenges and Rewards: Take on engaging minigames to earn rewards, tickets, and buffs. With a variety of enemies, card backers, and shrine choices, no two runs are ever the same. Are you cunning enough to survive the cursed forest and ring the bell to break the cycle?
